content: Hello everyone, Looking to purchase the following: 1) 2011 Casascius 25BTC reedemed2) 2011, 2012 Casascius 1BTC/redeemed/blankPotential sellers please do DM me with screenshots of the coins and your price. Escrow accepted: Minerjones. Ref to what exactly am looking for : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440873.0Thanks

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Looking also for the following - unloaded for the time being with holograph preferably: Original series 0.1 BTC coinOriginal series 0.5 BTC coinOriginal series 1 BTC coin.Second series 1 BTC coin.1 BTC Fine Silver Round.10 BTC silver round.2011 Casascius Bearer Bar redeemed (Original paper envelope from Casascius always welcome)  Drop your screenshots and offers or just DM Me. Thanks

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Damn, was just looking at MJ's auction...  Pretty crazy how much redeemed cas's are going for nowadays! Back in 2014-2015 that wouldn't have been worth anywhere near those prices lol... I have some peeled cas coins as well, but at the moment, I'm definitely not willing to sell any now that I see what they are going for ... Good luck, I'm sure there are many coins peeled out there looking for a home... appears to be 213 peeled 25's out there!https://casasciustracker.com/?page_size=100&flt0_balance_equals=0&flt1_type_equals=S1-COIN-25

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on March 20, 2023, 01:41:27 AMDamn, was just looking at MJ's auction...  Pretty crazy how much redeemed cas's are going for nowadays! Back in 2014-2015 that wouldn't have been worth anywhere near those prices lol... I have some peeled cas coins as well, but at the moment, I'm definitely not willing to sell any now that I see what they are going for ... Good luck, I'm sure there are many coins peeled out there looking for a home... appears to be 213 peeled 25's out there!https://casasciustracker.com/?page_size=100&flt0_balance_equals=0&flt1_type_equals=S1-COIN-25 Depends what your measuring stick is... is it USD or BTC? They will be worth much more in USD terms, but down in BTC terms since 2014-2015
